TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: I want to help but I'm short of time currently. I also need to learn blender and unity.

> 
> Triston, your inbox needs clearing again.

clean
Geez Tristonwilson you get 300 messages a day?

> 
> Geez Tristonwilson you get 300 messages a day?

something like that

Attention: this is open to anybody with texturing experience; I've found that I pretty much suck at texturing, however I'm a decent 3D modeler. If someone would like to make the textures while I do the modeling I think I could do what I'm good at much better. I would prefer anybody except liquid, triston at kart because they're all good at everything and I'd be holding them back. So do I have any volunteers?

White sands runway and V-2 pad are done on the 3D moddeling part of it, they need texturing tho

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-31T00:40:12Z" title="08/31/2015 12:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 31, 2015</time> by MajorLeaugeRocketScience**

I'll do Vandenberg if I have time

PS. Can I do a shuttle era SLC-6 as well as today's version?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-31T05:07:15Z" title="08/31/2015 05:07  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 31, 2015</time> by Bev7787**

God dammit.

![Z3E5iqM.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z3E5iqM.png)

![wFf8DK4.png](http://i.imgur.com/wFf8DK4.png)

Poly count...is a \*bit\* high. I'm currently trying to figure out how I should do the trees. It's just a fast render, the texture is not aligned properly currently. It's really big. Of course I'll still have to do the launch equipment, but I think you can already see how this will turn out. ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)
